Calculate model statistics

Source: R/calcs_fitting.R
calculate_model_stats.Rd

Calculate model statistics

calculate_model_stats(
  model_data,
  fit_coeffs_vec,
  glm_results = NULL,
  fit_algorithm = NULL,
  response = "yield",
  link = c("identity", "log"),
  type = c("theory", "raw"),
  Y = NULL,
  mu = NULL,
  n = NULL,
  npar = NULL,
  genome_fraction = NULL,
  calc_type = c("fitting", "estimation")
)

Arguments

model_data

Data of the model
fit_coeffs_vec

Vector of fitting coefficients
glm_results

Results of glm
fit_algorithm

String of the algorithm used
response

Type of response
link

Fit link
type

Theoretical or raw glm model statistics
Y

Y response (required in constraint-maxlik-optimization)
mu

mu response required in constraint-maxlik-optimization)
n

number of parameters (required in constraint-maxlik-optimization)
npar

number of parameters (required in constraint-maxlik-optimization)
genome_fraction

Genomic fraction used in translocations
calc_type

Calculation type, either "fitting" or "estimation"

Value

Model statistics data frame
